scene.name: intro
scene.line: That's not how it's supposed to look. You've made a mistake setting it up. Is it a foreign object to you? Which of your parents was it who wouldn't allow you to watch television?
scene.option: Ma thought she heard ghosts in the static.
I know how to set up a TV.

scene.name: after-tv-setup-ma
scene.line: I know about that. She was ill, wasn't she? Mentally, I mean. Kind of distant, fearful?
scene.option: Fearful, yeah. That's a way to put it.
No, things just had to be a certain way.

scene.name: after-tv-setup-dad
scene.line: I know about that. He was ill, wasn't he? Mentally, I mean. Kind of cautious, timid?
scene.option: Cautious, yeah. That's a way to put it.
No, things just had to be a certain way.

scene.name: after-tv-setup-look-at-tv
scene.line: You have it all backwards. I'm not surprised; are you? Have you been paying attention? I don't think you have.
It's time to start paying attention now, Conway. Look closely at the television.
